General.Name: Duta Anggada Realty Tbk
General.Description: PT Duta Anggada Realty Tbk. engages in the real estate development activities in Indonesia. It develops, sells, rents, and manages residential apartments, office buildings, hotels, and shopping centers in Jakarta and Bali. The company also provides tourism hospitality and other related services. The company was formerly known as PT Duta Anggada Inti Pratama and changed its name to PT Duta Anggada Realty Tbk. in April 1997. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
